fundamentalAnalysis.title: Fundamental Analysis
fundamentalAnalysis.description: At Forex Fundamental Edge, The Fundamental attribution error is a cognitive bias where individuals tend to overemphasize personality traits when explaining the behavior of others, while underemphasizing situational factors that might have influenced their actions. In simpler terms, we often assume others are acting the way they do because of who they are, rather than because of circumstances beyond their control.

technicalAnalysis.title: Technical Analysis
technicalAnalysis.description: Technical analysis in forex trading involves studying price charts and using statistical indicators to determine future currency price movements.

news.title: News & Events
news.description: At {highlight}, we bring you the latest market-moving news and events that impact currency trading. Stay informed with our curated selection of important financial news, economic indicators, and market analysis from trusted sources worldwide.
